review_text: Great place to stay. In walking distance of everything you'd want to do in downtown Paducah!

VERY comfortable and spacious. The windows are amazing and the place is welcoming and not fussy in the slightest. We had kids with us and it was perfect. Ample space to spread out and very comfortable bedding and blankets. Best place we have stayed on our annual trip to Paducah.
Thank you!
This was a great place to stay. Extremely clean, spacious, and all around nice loft.
Beautiful location clean very easy instructions to get in wonderful stay!
The loft was great and I’ll look to stay there again when in the area. Not sure how it sleeps 5, but maybe I misread the description. Bed was comfy. Getting in was easy.

Throughly enjoyed our stay! Our only suggestion would be to replace the black pull out bed /sofa. It is lumpy and very uncomfortable. We were only staying with two people so my sister in law switched to the leather pull out bed/ sofa and that was comfortable. Would have been a problem if we had needed to use both pull out beds. Other than that the place was Very , very clean; well stocked with everything from a first aide kit to garbage bags; wonderful decor; walking distance for many places to eat and safe neighborhood. Host was quick to respond to any question we had!
Such a great location for downtown Paducah. Easy walk to river, quilt museum, restaurants. The loft was easy bigger than we expected and super comfortable.
Really nice place! quite large in fact!
Best place to stay with or without kids! Tons of food and entertainment in walking distance. Very clean and spacious! Will be staying again!

Very underrated, the host is absolutely responsive, and she definitely lives up to cleanliness, the loft was fully stocked with LITERALLY EVERYTHING YOU COULD POSSIBLY NEED. It’s such a large space, my mind could actually relax, to journal, feel at peace, people watch outside the windows, and feel like I’m actually getting away from the real world, but if I wanted to walk out the door everything from eating to needing to shop is in walking distance. There is something very different about this air bnb. The loft had good energy, for two nights I truly felt like I was in a different state, breathing different air, mmmhmmmm also so modern, and so dang peaceful. Okay to wrap this up.. I will DEFINITELY be booking again. This is one of by far the best Airbnbs I stayed in. 5 stars💞
Nice place. Great workout climbing all those stairs lol somehow or another even that was elegant. Will definitely stay again.
I will definitely be booking again!!!

For my son’s 13th birthday we rented The Loft. The pictures do this place no justice. It was VERY spacious and has beautiful esthetics. It was a very clean and put together space. We enjoyed our stay. The price is great, location as well. Right in the heart of downtown Paducah. Bars and restaurants are on the strip. Family friendly though. They provide plenty of sleepwear such as blankets, pillows and ect so no need to bring your own. We will definitely rent this space again.

GREAT location for being able to walk to convention center events / pubs/ dinner etc {umbrellas by door came in handy for us !) . Spacious enough for group to stay in loft and hang out as well.
Private entrance - easy to find .
Responsive owner ( our code didn't work on door and in less than 1-2 mins - issues solved !!! ).
Safe area
-- just don't forget three flights of stairs to get in :)
Will stay here again !!
** over /under restaurant/bar near by was great !
Very nice place! Its a vibe forsure

This we our first time booking this property, The location was perfect if you love downtown Paducah, the loft was very clean , everything you need was there. I couldn’t have ask for a better place to stay. I will highly recommend renting this property .
We loved our stay at the Loft. The space was wonderful and very convenient for walking to everything downtown.
Always a great place to stay with more than enough room thanks again
This was our second stay at Four Rivers. We enjoyed ourselves and will definitely return.

This place met my expectations and more! The pictures do not do this place justice. Big, roomy, comfortable, clean and smelled good. Great location!! Within walking distance to restaurants and shops. We will definitely be staying here again.
This Had To Be The Best AirBNB I’ve Ever Stayed At.
Perfect location! Kitchen is huge, bathrooms were super clean and stocked. Comfortable bed.
Beautiful surroundings and near Paducah's Market Street and many downtown shops and restaurants. I will stay again. Comfy firm bed <3
Very clean, very spacious and beautiful. Close to a ton of things downtown.
Another great stay with 4 rivers!
Love the location. Thanks for a great stay.
This place is perfect for a visit to downtown Paducah. It’s an easy walk to the local restaurants and nightlife. It was spotlessly clean and very chic. Will definitely stay again. Highly recommended.

Pictures do not do this space justice. It is incredibly large —as in epically large. Located right on Broadway street, with convenient parking behind the building, it may be one of my favorite places yet. We walked everywhere, as The Loft is located in the downtown business district. Although we only stayed one night, we could tell the kitchen was furnished with everything we would need for a longer stay. All other needs were overly stocked as well. The bed and bedding were incredibly comfortable and the incredible great room was so relaxing to just hang out in. We will definitely return!
We will definitely be back soon! We had such a great weekend here. The host was very responsive and friendly. Great location and walking distance to a lot of restaurants and bars

Absolutely loved our stay in The Loft. As long as you can handle the stairs, this Airbnb is wonderful!!!
The loft bedroom is fantastic! All the amenities you can think of were provided.
Great location.
Very clean.
The living room is enormous, as is the smart TV!
Can't say enough about this awesome place!!!
Great stay!
Great spot, beautiful loft, very comfortable with all the downtown fun just steps away. Highly recommended.
Great place to stay, located in the heart of town, close to bars, restaurants, and the Carson Center. The Loft is spacious, clean, and we were able to park right by the door.
We will definitely be staying here again... You cannot beat the location or the space. Worth it.

We were so pleased with our find of this place! We had never been to Paducah before so we didn’t know what to expect. Our only downfall was we stayed on a Sunday night and the town was pretty well shut down. We loved finding Dry Ground Brewing Company though and would definitely recommend it. An unexpected plus, the town has a Labor Day parade! It passed right below us and was so fun to watch! We loved visiting the mural and then finishing up at Purple Toad Winery. The loft was clean and beautiful and check in was a breeze. Would definitely stay here again.

This place is more beautiful than the photos. So spacious. The bed was super comfortable and even the pullout for my 7 year old was so comfy. Truly so much space, but also so cozy. The location is right downtown which is super convenient for shops and restaurants. We were in town to eat at Freight House Restaurant and could easily walk there. And the host was so responsive with check in and parking instructions. There are quite a few stairs, so you’d need to be prepared for that. Will definitely stay again!
Great place, bar across the road was loud but nothing a fan wouldn’t take care of. We will be back.

The Four Rivers was very clean and comfortable. I felt safe and secure. It was much more than I needed but it had everything and the hosts were very responsive. I would highly recomment their place if you ever want to visit the downtown area of Paducah. Thank you!

First time in Paducah. There weren’t any nice hotels available at comparable pricing and we were thrilled for this option at the Loft. Great downtown location with easy parking and walkable neighborhoods. The space was great — plenty big enough for kids to run around, felt like a little oasis. Everything was clean and prepped, easy sleeping situation. Would book again 10/10
The loft was incredibly spacious, well cleaned, and nicely kept up. Really appreciated not having to do any pre-check out cleaning/tidying tasks.
Thank you for the stay
The loft was super nice and clean. It smelled clean and fresh, and it was kept super cool which felt good after coming in from outside.
Spacious home, comfortable bed, we had a good time
Great location. Within walking distance to everything I wanted to do. Truly felt like home
Great place and location!

Very spacious, spotless and modern loft - with the warmth and charm of an upscale farmhouse offering a view from a wall of windows one flight up from an arty and eclectic downtown street. Kindnesses like granola bars, coffee and filtered water. We loved it and wish we’d booked longer.

This place is exactly as described! 1 thing that stood out to me was how clean it smelled before even entering. We didn’t get to spend as much time in the Airbnb as we’d like but we’ll be back and would absolutely stay here again!
Huge space with a great location.

This loft was amazing !!! It is huge , the windows were our favorite part . The buildings around it were just beautiful. The bed was very comfy . Snacks & coffee were provided, which is always a nice surprise. Also just a few blocks to walk to the river & great eating places & nice shops. The host responded ASAP when I had questions. Just book it........I plan on going back next year to stay again when I visit Hancock's to buy more fabric !!
This was my first airbnb, but I can almost guarantee that it’ll stay my favorite. Well worth it
Location is perfect- safe - plenty of room. Great view!!

Incredible space! We enjoyed gazing out the floor to ceiling windows. Extremely clean and all the amenities one could need. If you’re a light sleeper and staying over the weekend, bring your earplugs as the folks at the bar across the street can get rowdy. Even so, we loved our stay!
Great place, close to many things to do in downtown. Easy to walk to and from. Very clean!

This place was everything in the description, and they were so easy to work with. Kirchoff’s bakery, Paducah Beer Werks, a plethora of great restaurants, and the rail and quilt museums were all within a short walking distance.
The majority of downtown rolls up the sidewalks around 9~10pm during the week, so it was good and quiet for a weeknight. The downtown and the loft especially felt very safe.
Exceeded my expectations! Would definitely book again!

This place is at least 3 times larger than it appears in the photos. Spacious, clean and very well equipped. Super convenient to downtown restaurants, shops and bars.
Lots of steps, nightclub across the street was loud on weekend, but the piano bar next door is awesome.
Beautiful place to stay. Kitchen was perfect. Location was primo! The upper loft bedroom was so comfortable and beautiful. They were right about the stairs. Lots of them.

Beautiful, spacious loft in a prime downtown Paducah location. It has a private entrance and plenty of free parking. The host is kind, responsive, and had ZERO checkout chores, which was amazing! The master bedroom suite upstairs was a peaceful spot with a super-comfortable king bed, a couch, huge closet and big bathroom. Plus, an added bonus was the half-bath on the main level. We hope to stay again soon!
The loft was a perfect location for our needs. Very spacious and clean. Great little details
Awesome loft very beautiful and very well maintained! Awesome location
Beautiful place!! Loved that it was downtown very spacious too!
What a great hidden gem in Paducah. It was the perfect location for my wedding venue!
Very nice accommodations. Super clean and very spacious.
Hands down one of the most impressive places I've had the opportunity to work in. I'd love to come back again
A gem in downtown .

This loft is truly beautiful! It was great for our group of 6 women ranging from age 30 to 73 years old to celebrate our best friend’s 40th birthday at Max’s and play card games back at the loft. The loft was so cozy and was honestly so much bigger and BETTER than I would have even expected. The only reason I didn’t give a 5 star is unfortunately we were not sent a code to get into the door. I reached out to the owner by message twice including my cell phone number. We never heard back even after checking out. Fortunately, I walked into the business next door to ask if they had any idea who owned the loft. They said their business did and they didn’t know why I didn’t receive the code, but that they could help me. Had we gotten there a little later after they closed I’m not sure how we would have gotten in… Again, we thoroughly enjoyed this stay and I’d definitely stay again!!! There is a bar across the street that is VERY loud until close to 2am, but they have sound machines!!
Great apartment close to restaurants and shops. Great view from the living room and upstairs. Nice kitchen, loved the kcup selection. Hands down one of the cleanest rentals we’ve stayed at.
One of the nicest AirBnBs I have ever stayed at. Far bigger than I needed for just myself, but I wouldn't hesitate to book it again

There was a bit of confusion with the early check-in but the host resolved the issue quickly and promptly. My bf and I had an in town getaway for the night and The Loft was perfect and very spacious. Thank you for providing excellent service and ensuring our stay was comfortable. We felt right at home as everything we needed was provided. I loved the Motts Apple Cider! Lol We will be booking again.
Great place. Spotless. Great location. Easy check in/check out. Good communication.
Very great place to stay 10/10 recommend
wonderful place! we love staying here ever time we're in town.
Everything was great. Thanks again!!!

Only suggestion is replace the mattress on the hideaway bed in living room near the steps.
It was great for a getaway from everyday life to enjoy time with family!
Very nice place and great communication from the owner
Spacious and inviting! Love it

Came into town to visit family for the holidays. We loved this loft apartment. Loft bed was comfortable, tons of space, great downtown location, and host gave clear instructions on check in & check out.
For others, there’s a bar across the street and they were pretty loud at nights. We slept fine, just something to be aware of. Additionally, we didn’t sleep on the pullout couches, but my sisters said they were uncomfortable. It was better for them to sleep just on the couch itself.
Overall we’ll be staying here again and highly recommend this apartment
Great location! So spacious!
Wonderful place to stay. I will definitely stay again! Highly recommended
Really big place, lots of space and stairs but we got use to them.
Really nice place right in the middle of downtown Paducah
I had a fantastic stay. This was my second time at this location. The loft is fantastic, beautiful, large and clean. 10/10 recommend!
Hidden gem. Great place. Great location.

Our stay here was great! Perfect location to all the downtown festivities for my sister's wedding. We had an issue with the door code when getting in, but that was resolved by Gretchen very quickly and pleasantly. The space was even bigger and more open in person than the pictures. Would definitely stay here again.
great place!
Wonderful space, absolutely loved it

Four Rivers: Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful during our stay! You definitely helped make our 2022 Thanksgiving memorable! We’d love to come back in the future! The place was super clean, we had plenty of blankets, comforters, and pillows for the 3 sleeping arrangements and an abundance of cookware to help make our meals possible! Great location for quick access to our family who lives in town, the grocery, Red’s Donut’s and much more! Highly recommend!
Place was awesome! Super clean, great location and really cool! definitely recommend!!
Definitely go back when in the area 5 star

This is our second time staying here. The loft is always exttemely clean and noy cluttered. We love the location too! It's in close walking distance to everything downtown. We highly recommend staying here!
Great location and hosts!!

This was our favorite place we’ve stayed at in Paducah so far. Everything was spotless, better than described and was the perfect downtown location. Great communication with host. Would definitely recommend.
Love the location

What a beautiful loft! It’s even better in person - and so spacious! Right in the middle of the arts district, I could walk to everything if I wanted. Check-in and check-out were the easiest I’ve experienced and the convenient, hassle-free parking was a huge bonus. Very very quiet at night except for the soft church bells which were sweet to fall asleep to. A lovely way to visit Paducah.
Wish we could have stayed longer than one night! Overall it is a place in the middle of downtown that makes you feel you could live there. Would recommend.
Comfortable, clean,and modern living space downtown close to eateries & shopping. Highly recommend.

We enjoyed this so much. It was beautifully decorated and easily accessible. The house owners were wonderful to communicate with. We stayed with our 3 month old and made sure to park in the front. It was dark when we arrived and lots of people were partying. We could not hear the noises from the loft, which was very nice. Highly recommend this to anyone
Great place, very clean and updated. Provided everything I could possibly need.

Just book it!
We loved it! Huge windows, clean, cozy bed! The host thought of everything from soaps and k cups to sound machine and fire escape ladders!! (Thankfully didn’t need those). Hope this place is available every time I come to Paducah! As other reviews said- there are several steps- but they aren’t hard to climb (shallow and wide). We walked to all the food places, shops and tourist spots downtown! Wonderful anniversary weekend!
Great place. Quick communication. We Loved it!!

Perfect place very very spacious place to stay with a beautiful lofted bedroom & bathroom! There is also a half bath on lower level! Beautiful windows to look out over downtown & just walking distance from the Gold Rush Cafe!
Place was great! Very clean and spacious. Bigger than it looks in the pictures. Great location in the heart of downtown. Walkable to lots of different attractions.
Was a great place, very clean and was nice we could walk to restaurants and shops
It was nice and clean, no complains on my end. A really lovely place to stay for a trip in Paducah for a good price

Amazing location that is within walking distance of everything you need downtown! We loved being able to walk to dinner and then go enjoy the beautiful river views. The best part is how much room the loft provides! We usually stay in the 1857 hotel and it will be hard to go back having all this room!
We parked and never moved until we left to go home. The owners were very accommodating with great communication. We will definitely be back!
Very clean and lots of room! Quick communication and great location. Highly recommend.
Amazing place, amazing location!! Will be back again!
Wow! This Air BnB was elegant, spacious and met all our needs. It was downtown, close to many restaurants and shops! Hostess made it easy! This Air BnB is one of a kind!
Great stay!! Great price!!

Excellent place to stay! Very clean and roomy. We loved the board/card games available and played almost all of them. I’m not one to leave so much as a dirty glass in the sink but I appreciated how easy checkout was, as they didn’t require clean up (linens gathered, dishes washed, trash taken out, etc). I’ve always hated that we get charged a cleaning fee yet most require you to clean before leaving. This was one of my favorite places I’ve stayed and we are looking forward to coming back in the future.
Beautiful and well appointed apartment with a fabulous location near the heart of Paducah
Very nice place! Felt right at home and enjoyed being right downtown.
Great space, lots of room, good location.
Clean and spacious! Stayed one night while passing through town. Walked down the street to attend mass and ordered pizza. Our family loved it! Great value and much better than staying in a hotel!
Great location plenty of space will definitely be staying again
Insanely cool apartment. Enough space to literally do laps- comfortable, clean, well equipped!

The loft was immaculate with an amazing view of Paducah’s downtown nightlife!!! All of the amenities they provided made for extremely comfortable stay without having to bring my whole house with me. We would definitely recommend this loft for anyone wanting to partake in the nightlife and/or the fun shops that are up & down Broadway. My husband and I will be making a return trip without the kids in the near future.

Four Rivers Loft is well located so that a car could be entirely unnecessary. We enjoyed walking everywhere in the historic district. The Loft is very spacious with large windows, making a pleasant space to spend a few days. Be aware that there are three sets of stairs to load up and down from the loft.

Great location. Walking distance to all the local restaurants and bars. We walked to Freight House (6 minutes) and that restaurant was wonderful! The loft was perfect! So spacious and tastefully decorated! Very clean! Extras like snacks, toiletries made for a great stay! We can’t wait to come back!
Great location and great Airbnb!! The location was excellent (walking distance to downtown restaurants and a bike path).

We recommend this property at the Loft@415 100%!
You will not be disappointed! This property has every accommodation you could ever need and is in the amazing location of Paducah Kentucky!
Information:
This property is a walk-up and could be hard for those that struggle with stairs!
There are 3 flight of wide hard floor stairs (close to 20 stairs) when you come in the first door. To get to the loft bedroom you also have 2 more flights of wide carpeted stairs (about 20 stairs).
- the stairs are wide and very easy to walk up -
Cleanliness- 100% top of the line not one negative thing to say

Communication with host- 100% EASY to contact and quick response
Location- 100% PERFECT! Right by or within walking distance of everything in town.
Parking - very easy! Park behind the building on the east outside edge (across from the bank) of the parking lot. This will shorten your walk to the front door!

Accuracy- everything is just as described. 100%
Value- 100% we feel we got what we paid for and more!
Check in- 100% the information was sent via airbnb message and VERY easy to understand and follow!
Over the top accommodations not expected included - board games, extra pillows(linens), fully equipped kitchen (quality Frigidaire Gallery appliances) & snacks!
Paducah is a quaint, cozy, quiet old school meets new school town that is full of surprises!
Be at ease knowing the Loft@415 will provided you perfect accommodations and will assist your long stay or just a night passing through in all ways!
Great communication from the host. You get the pin to get in the building in advance of arriving and they answers questions quickly.
Perfection at every level. Stay here you'll be amazed by all accounts. High end living in Paducah... nuff said!
If you’re looking for a beautiful, clean, convenient space in downtown Paducah, this is the place.
We were pleasantly surprised at how spacious this place was! Cleanly, roomy, great amenities and in the heart of downtown.

A lovely space with huge windows, comfy places to sit, and thoughtful touches. It was pristine and as advertised. The location is great, right in the middle of Paducah’s attractions. The host was quick to respond and very welcoming. I loved my getaway.

Great place to stay downtown! Easily accessible, close to multiple restaurants and bars in the downtown area. I didn’t experience any problems with noise level and it felt very safe! Easy checkin with code and communication with the host was great!! I would definitely stay here again!

This space was perfect for us. We loved the location which is right in the middle of everything downtown Paducah has to offer. We were also impressed with the amount of space inside. We were 100% satisfied with our stay. Thanks.
Absolutely impeccable! Luxury accommodations in a perfect area, and the easiest check in/out procedures I've ever seen.

I'm going to confidently say that you will not find a better option for staying in this area. The unit is AMAZING. Everything is squeaky clean, very well updated, and the location is perfect. There were also lots of other "little touches" and amenities that we did not expect. Book it if you can!
This is a great place to stay in downtown Paducah aduka huge can sleep lots of people to fold out couches super comfortable my only real complaint was that
Great location and wonderful hosts that respond quickly to any questions. Highly recommend.

Very spacious accommodations, bright and clean. Bed was comfortable and bathroom had all the amenities you needed - including toothpaste which I forgot to pack! The kitchen could house an army of people too, lots of room.
Great location and HUGE place! We were in town for a wedding. Location is walkable to places to eat and bars. Very clean and had everything we needed.

We definitely recommend this place if you are visiting Paducah!! Pictures do not do this place justice!! The owners have thought of so many little details. The kitchen and bathroom were well-appointed. Everything was spotless and so clean in the entire place! There was some noise in the evening from the bar across the road, but once it closed for the night it was so quiet. The location is wonderful—you can walk down to the cute shops and to the river walk. There are flights of stairs leading up to the apartment as well as stairs to the bedroom, so keep that in mind if stairs are an issue. Parking is free and there are plenty of spots in the well-lit back lot. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again!
Such a cool place! Enjoyed the apartment and exploring the town!
Enjoy a wonderful roomy stay in a loft in historical downtown Paducah. Restaurants and events were in walking distance. We had a great time.
Amazing place to stay
Beautiful home! Great location. Couldn’t have asked for a cleaner or nicer place to stay. Walking distance to everything downtown.
Absolutely incredible, clean and beautiful. Decorated nicely. Great access to the downtown! The pictures dont even do this place justice!

Great location, loft and host. Everything was thought of and we were able to walk to a number of local restaurants and bars. Parked the car and left it for the duration of our visit. Highly recommend for your visit to Paducah!
This was a great stay. House was very clean and ready for us. The location was great, it was prefect for the weekend!
Great place and location
very cool place right in the middle of the downtown area

Perfect location and beautiful view! It is bigger than the pictures look and so spacious. Will definitely stay here again. My only regret is that we were only in town one night and didn’t arrive until late!
Great stay!
Fantastic place! Very clean with many extras. Highly recommended.
Great communication.
Really cool place in center of town. Highly recommend if in Paducah.

If your looking for an easy, worry free and close to everything great place to stay in downtown Paducah, this is it.
Skip the hotel, this has everything you need and is a much better value.

Hands down... this is the absolutely BEST place I've ever rented. I honestly don't believe any other place will be able to contend with this loft!
im a traveling medical professional and I rented this place for a month so i became very familiar with the area and unit.
I'll start with the good:
cleanest place ever. everythings was immaculate!
snacks were provided, Keurig/coffee pot combo pods provided, sugar, filters... etc
everything you need is there and more. I can't even name all the accommodations that is on hand here but I didn't have to buy anything but food!
This place is huge and honestly, I was in awe over this unit and accommodations.
The bed was so comfortable! the huge bedroom was perfect!
The host: Literally responds within minutes. ANY problem that arises this host will solve it before you can complain... in fact with a view like this place you can't complain!
Places to eat nearby literally two blocks more or less and shopping isn't very far away! *antique shop was wonderful*
Now on to the bad:
Having to find a place as great as this!
thank you @Four Rivers!! You made my stay here alot easier and comfortable than I imagined!

What an awesome place!!! We came in for a night with our 3 daughters to celebrate our 17th wedding anniversary(Saturday) with a nice meal and some relax time. Owner was very easy to communicate with. Instructions were very clear! Great, Great, Great, Location. Can’t say enough good things! Very worth checking this place for your next stay!

What a wonderful find! Truly a gem. Absolutely spotless, well-appointed and comfortable. We found this loft at the last minute, and could not have been happier with our stay. We only wish we were staying longer. We were really in awe when we walked though the property for the first time. We will absolutely look to stay at Loft@415 again when we travel here again. We have no reservations recommending a stay.

I love how this unit is in the center of downtown Paducah. Communication was concise, and the listing was accurate. We did find a random unused roll of toilet paper under the bed, and some used paper towels on an end table where it looks like they were wiping down furniture in between guest, I am sure this was an oversight. You can’t beat the location.

Lovely light in the morning from the massive windows! It’s way bigger than the pics make it look- like huge. It’s a fun spot and comfortable upstairs bed! This isn’t a cozy space, but if you want more of an industrial vibe, this is a good apartment!
This place is PRISTINE, spotless and very comfortable. Great king bed upstairs and wonderful amenities. Would definitely stay again.
Very nice place
This is the cleanest Airbnb I have ever stayed at. The location was great, close to everything. We enjoyed our stay!

Our stay was great! My husband and I really enjoyed the place. It was close to everything we wanted to do. We walked to the downtown bars at night and to coffee the next morning. The place was very clean and spacious. They provided snacks and coffee. The view of Broadway is great.
The only thing to note is the actual loft is a bit hard to find. We drove around the blocks for about 15 minutes looking to the “Loft at 415” logo on the glass door. I did message the host and they were quick to respond with what the listing says- to look for the “loft at 415” logo…. So we continued to do that. Honestly, we only found the place after zooming into pictures on the listing and using clues of the other buildings to see where this was exactly. The logo is black and it blended in with the door.
So, just note that it’s right beside “Turning Point” which has a sign hanging from their door.
The rest of the check in process was super easy. That was our only thing that could be improved upon.
We would stay again.

We came to Paducah for a night to celebrate a friends birthday. This AirBNB went above and beyond our expectations! This is the coolest place. It’s HUGE first of all. Second, we got a great price! It was clean, very private, the towels were big and fluffy, there was a stock of all the KCups one would need, the bed was super comfy, and it smelled like fresh laundry when we walked in. We ate dinner at Over/Under which is literally 1 block away so no driving! We had a great time and our friend that we surprised was so happy with the place we chose to stay. The best part? They don’t leave a full page of instructions on what to do before you leave - you just LEAVE! Thank you for sharing this place with us and we will definitely recommend The Loft @ 415!
Perfect!
Awesome place to stay

This was a great spot of a quick weekend getaway with restaurants and other entertainment venues within walking distance. If you like craft breweries, we recommend Paducah Beer Werks. It was a clean and comfortable space with fantastic, large windows, making people-watching a nice way to spend an afternoon or evening.
Great and fast communication. Awesome property and very accommodating!
Always a joy to be able to stay here. The space is perfect, spacious, and located in the middle of so much to do!
A beautiful spacious loft was perfect for our Anniversary night away from home.

This is a very clean, very nice and all around place to stay! We will definitely be staying there again. It was so clean and so much room! It's so close to everything around the river front. The host was awesome with anything that we needed. It was an awesome weekend get a way!!
best place in town to relax
This is big city loft in a small town! The feel is like an Edward Hopper painting in that the center of everything is space! You will lack nothing!
An excellent value and great location.
This place was much bigger than I expected! So nice and clean! Great view of downtown Paducah. Definitely look forward to staying here again next time we come to town.
Beautiful place !

My sis and I had a wonderful stay in downtown in this lovely space. Fun city street views in the arts district. We look forward to staying longer next time to enjoy more of downtown. Our host was easy to work with and check-in/out was contactless and private. Appreciated the stocked coffee.
Might want to bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper due to the loud sound when the heat/air turns on.

I think others may have said it already. The pics don't tell the whole story. This place is huge and well equipped. A great place to hang out. There is one full bath in the bedroom and one-half bath on the main floor. There is also a walk-in closet off the master with plenty of hangers and storage space. The space is new and clean. There are two sleeper sofas and bedding for on the main floor. The ceiling in the main area is 20'plus high with large windows. You can walk to everything in the downtown. We will look for this place again when we plan a return visit.
We had a lovey stay. The apartment was very clean, beautiful and in a great location. Four Rivers were very responsive. We look forward to next time.
My stay was everything I hoped for. The host was very helpful. The Loft was beautiful.
Everything was perfect! I had such a great time! Walking distance from all the restaurants and bar's. The apartment was HUGE! Definitely a plus!
Awesome location, very spacious, stylish, and beautiful place to stay!!
Pictures don’t do the loft justice.

This place is great! It is furnished with everything you could possibly need. You can walk all over downtown. We loved people watching out the huge windows. Our teenagers can't wait to come back and stay here! We love downtown Paducah and we love this place as well! Just an FYI there are 3 flights of stairs to climb and an additional flight for the bedroom loft. We didn't mind it but something to think about if you don't like stairs.

Everything was clean and comfortable! The attention to detail made everything feel cozy and homelike. The floor to ceiling windows provide an incredible view of the town. If we ever pass through again, we’ll be sure to come back to Four Rivers!
The place was fantastic. Was well stocked with everything(snacks, toiletries, towels, pillows, etc) ! Is one of the cleanest rentals I’ve stayed in!
Great location and price
Wonderful stay perfect for the groomsman to get ready the day of our wedding!
It was so clean and very great view. I will be staying here again :)
This place is HUGE! It's impossible to tell how big just from the pictures. Very comfortable, very private, very clean. Giant floor to ceiling windows make it an amazing stay.

The loft is amazing! It was super clean and spacious. We felt right at home. The host provided various snacks and coffee options. Also everything you would need to cook a meal (except the actual groceries of course) is right there in the kitchen. There were plenty of extra blankets, pillows, and towels. We were within walking distance of many different shops and restaurants. The view was beautiful. I have no complaints at all and can’t wait to stay here again.
What a great stay! Highly recommended

Absolutely 💯 %
Do not hesitate to book.

The view was honestly the reason we chose to book our stay here, and we are so glad that we did. Not only is the view picturesque, but the loft as a whole is amazing. It is extremely clean and well kept. The location is in walking distance to several good restaurants, as well as the river. We will definitely choose to stay here next year if it is still available!
Big place and great view. Very comfortable

If there was a way to give a higher rating i would! Just book it. You won’t regret it. The place is stunning. Walking ability to EVERYTHING. The floor to ceiling windows with vaulted ceilings make this place feel so luxurious. I booked a night for the next 3 months because it is such a good area and stay. The kitchen is huge for cooking and plenty of space for entertaining. Every extra detail was paid attention to. Snacks, toiletries, soft blankets, extra pillows, etc. i live in the area and loved this for a home away from home.

This apartment has obviously just been renovated, everything is brand new and is totally AWESOME in all regards.
Large and very spacious space. Attention to every detail has been added.
The bed in the upper loft is very comfortable.
The only thing worth noting is the amount of stairs to get to apartment and then again to the bedroom.
If stairs are not an issue, then this is offering is definitely worth the exercise.
Loved it !!

We absolutely loved our stay. it was a staycation so we were already familiar the the area. I can honestly say that the pictures do not give this place justice. there is so much room. the windows overlooking Broadway sold it all.
I will warn future renters that are 3 flights of stairs that lead up to the space. then another 2 more flights to get to the bedroom. other than that, perfect stay.
I will be attempting to stay here every time I come to Paducah. My stay was perfect. Clean, spacious, great views. Located in the best part of Paducah.
Amazing place! Clean, spacious, and gorgeous inside.
The condo is beautiful, host very attentive, and location great. The front windows are great. All the little details and a great value. Highly recommended!
Cozy and very cleaned and maintained
The cabin was pristine. Exactly how it was described. Beautiful location and so peaceful
Our experience was better than expected! We would recommend to everyone.

We were so pleased about everything at the cozy cabin. Tiffany is a perfect host and answered all our questions! The cabin was squeaky clean and tastefully decorated. The bed was very comfortable! Tiffinay thought of everything you would need to make your stay comfortable, from throws, while sitting at the fire pit, to snacks, and the coffee bar had everything you needed. The main attraction, the mini cows were a delight, especially as Tiffinay bottle-fed their new addition! We would definitely choose the Cozy Cabin again!

The stay at Tiffany’s was perfect for our family! Tiffany’s place is beautiful, clean, and she thought of everything! We enjoyed coffee every morning while talking to Daisy and Dozer! Tiffany also let my 4 yo feed Glimmer the new calf, which was a beautiful memory!!
10/10 would stay here again.
Thanks Tiffany!

Tiffany and Jeff’s place is amazing. One of my favorite Airbnbs ever. The house is pristine, immaculately kept, very well decorated, and has so many nice touches and amenities. Tiffany and Jeff are absolutely lovely and so hospitable. The surrounding property is spectacular and the location is wonderful. You’re close to the highway, but out in the quiet country, and only a short, pleasant drive to downtown Paducah. Just can’t say enough good things. If you’re in town for work, vacation, or just passing through town, I can’t recommend it more highly.
Clean, comfortable and peaceful. Very friend hosts. We came for rest and relaxation and that's exactly what we got!

Tiffany and Jeff were very helpful with any questions that we had. They are fantastic hosts. It was awesome feeding Dozer and Daisy and their new addition Glimmer (we got to bottle feed her! 💜). The amenities in the air bnb were perfect and it was very comfortable. All the places we ate around the area and the adventures we went on were spectacular! If you have time to drive an hour away you have to check out Bell Smith springs and Garden of the Gods. We can’t wait to come back! 🥰

This is a beautiful little cabin in Reidland! My bridesmaids and I had a wonderful stay here the night before my wedding. We enjoyed the fluffy cows, fire pit, exquisite cleanliness, and hospitality from the host! I would definitely stay again, and recommend that you do✨
The space was wonderful and exactly like it was described. It was close to shopping and I25 the cute Dozier and Daisy was just precious you have to feed them and pet them! Thank you so much
This cabin stay was AMAZING! We will definitely be coming back soon. There was so much to do so you will never be bored. My favorite part by far was the cows and the beautiful scenery!
Cute place, good location, comfy bed!

When we arrived, Tiffany and her grandson were actually outside. And I got to bottle feed a new calf of hers. She was very friendly and welcoming. The location was great. The space was roomy and clean.

Outstanding!
Deserves TEN STARS!
Squeaky clean, quiet, and cozy - I had a super restful stay. The property is beautiful and inviting, and Tiffany and her family made me feel right at home.
Visiting with the cows, and getting to feed baby Glimmer, were extra special highlights of my stay!
Hope to return again someday!
SPOTLESS! Easy to find. Very responsive host. The little touches around the place were very nice and did I mention how spotless it was? We were SO happy with staying there! We highly recommend it.

We loved our stay. Cabin was perfect for my husband and I. The location was great. Daisy and Dozer were the best part we loved waking up to them every morning. Tiffany was super friendly she even let me bottle feed the new baby which was just an added bonus. We will definitely be back.

Location is great - we came to Paducah to visit family from out of state, and this was the perfect spot. Exactly as described and absolutely clean. Very peaceful surroundings and quiet. Tiffany was super responsive and actually invited us to bottle fed their new calf. That was right place at the right time, but she totally wanted us to have that experience. Very cool. If you stay here you won’t regret it. Say hi to Daisy and Dozer for us!
Excellent stay. Super responsive hosts. Everything was beautifully decorated and spotless. Would definitely stay again!

My wife and I only stayed one night as we were traveling through the area and just needed a place to stop over for the night. We found the location to be in a very nice, quiet community within a few minutes of the interstate highway. There were several yummy snacks provided which we appreciated. Tiffany was very quick to respond when we asked about some local restaurants close enough to take out and eat at home. It was nice having a KING size bed which made for a good nights sleep. We will most definitely attempt to stay here again when traveling thru the area.

It was a beautiful and peaceful home. couldn't have asked better for the pickiest travelers. the decor felt like a winter wonderland and location wonderfully private. the thoughtful touches, coffee bar, and snacks were a sweet bonus
Nice and cozy! Definitely felt at home! Loved the decor! The bed slept amazing!
Great place to stay. Would stay again!
Great place to stay. Wonderful location

The place was great. It was quiet and homely. The host recommended eating at 1880 patties. It was amazing. I see why you need a reservation. The bed was really comfortable and the host also left snacks, coffee and water for us which I’ve never had at any place I’ve rented I thought that was very thoughtful and appreciated it. I would definitely rent from the host again. Thank you again.
Cute little place in a secluded neighborhood.
Loved everything about the property. Very peaceful and clean. Tiffany was a great host!

Just passing through for one night and Tiffany’s place was perfect! Everything we needed, close to restaurants but yet secluded with the beauty of nature. The cabin was perfect with everything you needed and more and so, so, so very clean!

We were on a weekend getaway and this space was perfect, could have stayed even longer! It’s within a few miles of great restaurants and things to do which is what I was looking for when booking. The pictures and descriptions were exact and check in/check out was easy breezy! When we arrived, the host was thoughtful and had left us banana bread in the fridge. Tea, coffee, snacks, and bedroom chocolates made us feel like we were staying in a nice hotel! This space was super clean and clutter free. Daisy and Dozer were outside of the bedroom window when we woke up in the mornings, I just wish the weekend we visited wasn’t raining so we could’ve given them snacks and pets.
Great place to stay 3 nights.
This place was amazing!! We will definitely book again!!!
It was great and well worth the trip. Would stay again.

This is a top notch place. Possibly the best air bnb I’ve ever visited. The hosts have thought of all the small things that can make a big difference for the traveler. Complimentary snacks, water and coffee bar. The kitchen has EVERYTHING you need to enjoy a shorter stay. Very functional use of the space. We were so pleased with our choice. And don’t forget to bond with the hairy friends out back! Our kids loved feeding the mini cows. A unique addition to make those extra memories on a trip. 10 out of 10!
Cute with lots of amenities. Very peaceful. Much needed relaxation on a long trip.
Stayed at Tiffany’s for a little Christmas retreat. It was perfect. Probably the cleanest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in.

This place was everything we hoped for! The fire pit was a highlight, we spent several nights there. The set up is superb! The place was very cozy and friendly. We appreciated the snack and coffee bar, not to mention the s’mores kit basket along with blankets to use at the fire pit!

This place is perfect for 2 people wanting to getaway and unwind. The mini cows Daisy and Dozer were refreshing as well. 5 stars and beyond!

If you are a light sleeper, consider bringing ear plugs or use a sound machine on your phone. There can be some light highway traffic in the distance at times. I’m assuming more so in the winter while the leaves are off the trees, but that was a minor issue.

Overall, the home is in a very nice peaceful neighborhood. With a grocery store only a few minutes away. Our host Tiffany was very accommodating and friendly. We will be back for sure!
Our stay was wonderful! The cabin is super cute and close to our extended family! We loved it!
It was a wonderful and extremely cute place went well over expectations. If you are needing a place to stay in the Paducah area i highly recommend this air bnb!

I thoroughly enjoyed this quiet, cute space. This is the perfect little place for a weekend getaway. Tiffany is very responsive & accommodating. If you’re looking for a place in Paducah, I would recommend!

wow. beautiful home and I am so glad we stopped and so sad we only where there for the night.
everything has such a consistent peaceful esthetic.

Tiffany’s place was incredibly homey and warm. It really was a home away from home. Tiffany and Jeff were great hosts who gave us privacy, but also were great at telling us more about the cows. The mini cows are truly the stars of the experience. I loved waking up and giving them treats every morning. The attention to the small details really made our stay top notch.
The location is amazing as there is so mcuh opportunity near by get outdoors and see different kinds of wildlife. There’s also great food nearby such as Reds Donuts.

Quiet, clean, and relaxing space for a getaway or weekend in Paducah! Cheri and Adam were incredibly thoughtful and even left snacks and toys for our two children to play with during our stay. Easy to communicate with and truly had everything you need. We would definitely stay again and highly recommend to anyone!
Cherish was very responsive and we loved being in her home! The house is in a great neighborhood, very clean, beautiful garden. I wish we had more to stay and would not hesitate to come back!
Absolutely wonderful place to stay. Private and peaceful. Just what you need to get away

Our stay was relaxing. We had a very busy vacation but returning to such a clean and modern home was such a great way to end each day! We will be coming back! our host was friendly and reached out after there being a storm, just to check on us and see if there was anything we might need. We appreciated the hospitality and kindness.

Great house in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Easy drive to downtown and hiking areas! Enjoyed the yard and fire pit. 270homes was very responsive to any questions we had. A great place to go for rest and relaxation. We went in May but the fall would also be a great time to visit. Lots of trees!
Had a really peaceful time at this air bnb enjoyed the nature and the home was really clean and well kept. Had a overall great stay.

Loved our stay here. It is a beautiful home…squeaky clean. It is everything as described in the listing. We didn’t need to contact our host for anything. When we checked out the host promptly answered our one question. Check in and out was simple.
We would be happy to come back for another stay.

the house was very nice, clean, and comfortable. the area is quite and peaceful. the back yard was nice.
the host was responsive and helpful.
overall, it was a great experience.

Fantastic property just far enough out of town for a quiet peaceful stay but close enough to get anything you need. Wish we could’ve stayed longer. Will definitely be back.
Owner is amazingly helpful and very quick to respond. Stay with confidence.

We stayed for 2 nights. The house was clean and comfortable. It rained while we were there but we enjoyed looking at the pond and the bunny and the birds. We were able to relax and get ready for the next leg of our trip.
Wonderful place! Worked perfect for our group. They go above and beyond for their guests and it made for the perfect stay.
Great clean place to stay! Good owners and very peaceful no one messed with us!

Home was exactly was we were looking for. Peaceful location, yet just a few minutes away from town and attractions. The home was very clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen and bathrooms were exceptional! Would definitely return here.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everything was wonderful.

From the second we walked in the door we were impressed! Bathrooms were very accommodating. Had everything you will need. Beds are comfortable and have the softest towels I have ever used. We brought our 3 boys and they loved it as well. We want to come back already and hope it is available the next time we are in town!
absolutely loved my stay!! My usual air bnb was booked so I decided to give this one a try. Beyond glad I did! I will be back❤️

Beautiful home! Quiet and peaceful. They had everything you would need unlike some air bnbs. Plenty of towels and extra toiletries. Everthing well stocked. Very clean place looks brand new inside. One of the nicer and well kept places I’ve stayed!
It was a great comforting place to vacation and visit family

Everything was perfect! We enjoyed our Thanksgiving dinner and the little ones enjoyed the time at the pond. It was safe and peaceful. The place has everything you need and some. The only thing that could make it better is changed one of the queen beds to a King!
What a great place - very comfortable. It had everything we needed, and made the Pre-Thanksgiving holiday trip much easier. We will definitely stay here each time we visit family in Paducah.

This home was perfect for our quiet weekend away. We never left the premises all weekend. The quaint, quiet countryside was exactly what we were looking for. We spent our weekend around the fire 🔥 it and on the front porch listening to music. And Bambino’s pizza is a great pizza for delivery!!

My daughter chose to stay her over having a birthday party and she was not disappointed. She says this is the best place she has ever stayed. Very relaxing, comfortable place. Beautiful view. Loved watching the deer at the pond every evening. We will be back. Excellent home away from home experience.

This place was perfect! We had everything that we needed and more. The home was beautifully decorated. The snacks were a nice touch! The home is very private yet close to everything in Paducah.
We would definitely stay again next time we’re in Paducah!
Clean, beautiful home in a private location but not far from downtown Paducah. Great instructions and a great host! We hope to return.

This was a last minute booking for us while staying in Kentucky and 270homes was the perfect fit! It was conveniently located, we were only a few minutes from stores and restaurants. The house was amazing!! It was so nice and clean, it was inviting and super comfy for our family! The backyard was awesome! We had so much fun sitting out back, grilling burgers and hotdogs, and roasting marshmallows over the fire! This is a perfect rental if you’re looking for a nice, quiet, private place to stay that’s minutes away from anything you would need! It gave my husband and I time to regroup together as well as reconnect and spend quality time with our kids! And I almost forgot to mention the fishing pond! It was awesome! So pleased with this rental and will absolutely be back!!!
We are repeat guests here and absolutely love it! The shower is amazing, and the kitchen is so great to cook in. The host is wonderful! We will for sure be back.
Beautiful places to just vibe with friends and family. I loved it there so quite and peaceful will be visiting again !

Great home! Perfect for rest and relaxation. The home is immaculate and close to Restaurants and shopping. Hosts are extremely responsive. Everything you need for your stay is there. Plenty of dishes, utensils, pots and pans, etc. The surprise treats and snacks were definitely an added bonus! Thanks again for everything!
Great place to stay while we were visiting friends - clean and inviting home, would stay again!

My son and I stopped on our way through town on a long trip. The house was spotless and we loved being able to fish in the pond on the property. Will certainly be stay again our next time passing through!
Very nice house. Perfect driveway for hauling a boat. Will definitely use again in the future.

Spotless and spacious home with lovely decor. Prompt host responses and a/c was set at a comfortable temperature which was a nice touch after a long day of driving.
Would 100% book again if in the area.

We absolutely LOVED this rental. I travel constantly for work and this place was amazing, the bathroom was the best I've had in a rental yet. Even though I came for work, the house made me feel right at home and relaxed. Comfy beds and a perfect kitchen to cook in. The host was incredible and I couldn't have asked for more from her. They accommodated me more than excpected of an airbnb. Loved.

I think anyone with three children knows it’s hard to find a place to stay on the road that accommodates a family well. This was just what we needed after a day of driving. Plenty of space for kids to run around. It was clean and comfortable. Would stay again for sure. Highly recommend.
Very clean, peaceful, great location, great communication with host. Very nice place for a getaway.
Great place

We enjoyed our stay. It was a very nice home with lots of extra features. We loved having the pond to go fishing. We loved the firepit and being able to have a fire and the treats that were provided were an amazing surprise. Also when we arrived there was a small gift waiting for our 5 yr old that was celebrating his 6th birthday. He was so excited and couldn't believe it when he seen it on the kitchen counter. When we are back in this area we will definitely be staying again.

This home was wonderful and had everything we needed! Well-stocked kitchen, beautiful master bath, comfortable family room and bedrooms, and great outdoor space! We had dogs with us and the backyard and surrounding property was great. It was a short drive to downtown and great restaurants, but felt like a private oasis.
We were also moving to a new state, so if anyone else is driving a truck while pulling a car on a trailer, the driveway has plenty of space!
Overall, we would 100% stay here again if we were coming through Paducah, and it was one of my favorite airbnbs I’ve stayed in!
This location was booked by my employer. I enjoyed my stay in Paducah! I did enjoy the pond and spacious yard. The house was super nice and clean!
Amazing Stay
Very nice place good fishing and very clean perfect for a get away

This is a very lovely spot, just the right distance from town for my prolonged work tour in Paducah. The house was perfect for my needs, and a pleasure to return to after work. The house had all the basics I required for the day-to-day.
Two nice bedrooms, two baths, and an open den/kitchen/dining worked great for me. So very much nicer than a hotel! The appliances are new and worked great.
The neighborhood was perfect for an early run or an evening walk. The pond is visible from the kitchen window and front porch, a great spot for morning coffee. There were frequent visits from deer, turkeys, and other wildlife.
Amanda and Shawn were outstanding! Any questions or needs I had were promptly addressed.
I will definitely look to stay here again should my travels take me back to Paducah.

We really enjoyed our stay at this house. It had nice finishes, was clean, in a great location and we loved the fishing pond. Paducah is cute and a great jumping off point to explore parts of KY, TN and IL. We never would have traveled to this area if not for COVID and really appreciated the chance to explore new states without dealing with a lot of people.
The kitchen wasn't quite as well stocked as some Airbnb homes when it came to knives and pots but there were also really great things like the disposable containers we packed lunches in (unfortunately, we found one in our car when we unpacked so blame us for not having a complete set).

The home is easy to access and sits on a sizeable wooded lot. A clean, bright, modern interior made a wonderful setting for our family stay with an open living space/kitchen leading to the back patio where a grill and firepit were at our disposal (they even had s'mores ingredients!). The kitchen was well stocked with cooking utensils and basic ingredients. Everything was spotless! The bedrooms are neat with beautifully redone bathrooms. Laundry was available, though we didn't use it during our stay. A car port made loading and unloading easy. The only negative was the power lines in front of the house, but once you're settled in you don't even notice them. Would definitely recommend for a cozy, stylish stay.

We stayed as a family of 4 and had plenty of comfortable space. Having two full bathrooms (both with very nice fixtures - loved the rainfall shower) was perfect for our visit. The kitchen had everything we needed for cooking, and the internet was also good. The books about Paducah were a fun local touch. Communication from the hosts was very prompt and we found the house easily, even with our late arrival. We would definitely stay again if we are in the area.
Perfect get away. Quiet and inviting. Highly recommend to anyone who wants to unplug.
Very nice property, great communication, everything needed & more was there for us. Nice personal touch & thoughtfulness.

We had a great time relaxing over a long weekend here. The house Cookes with some great touches — modern appliances, smoker, fire pit, Edison string lights outside. Also close to land between the lakes.
Super cute space, in the cutest area. My nephews loved nothing more than to throw fish food and watch the fish put on a show. Loved every minute spent there!!

Excellent stay!! House was sparkling clean, the hosts were SO RESPONSIVE, and the location was perfect - near lush woods, close to lots of hiking, restaurants, and other local amenities. Would easily stay here again!

This place really is Paducah’s best! It’s on a quiet street, just a few minutes from stores and restaurants, and was a perfect spot for my wife and me to get away from all this COVID nonsense for a few days. The house is extremely stylish and has been updated throughout. It’s also got a really nice back patio area with hanging lights and a fire pit. We loved feeding the fish in the pond as well! If our travels ever take us back to the Paducah area we’ll absolutely stay here again.

Amanda is a host that goes above and beyond. Do not hesitate to book this property. It is super clean and the house is stocked with everything you could want. We used it as home base for all of the state parks and recreational areas. There are so many great hiking trails all around the area.

We needed a little get away but wanted to maintain social distancing in these covid times. This place is the perfect spot to do so! We had contactless check in and were in a wonderful space to enjoy some quiet and nature. The home is very clean and has cute decor. The kitchen appliances are newer. The yard space is nice and feeding the fish did not disappoint! The hosts were kind and responded quickly when we had a few questions. I would highly recommend this home and we would gladly stay here again.

Fantastic house in semi-secluded area - this was an amazing home away from home! For a couple travelling, there was plenty of room with two bedrooms (we didn't even venture into the second bedroom) and two bathrooms. The amenities were fantastic, the host was very thoughtful and communicated very well! The highlight had to be feeding the fish in the pond - super fun! Plus grilling in the backyard was also a delight! The kitchen was also pretty well stocked and we actually cooked in the house about 4 of the 7 nights we stayed here. We wouldn't hesitate to come back to the area and stay in this airbnb.
Wonderful home and location, woupd stay again :)

We stayed here while in town for a wedding. The location was perfect for ease of travel and the setting was beautiful and quiet. The hosts were quick to respond and were very accommodating. Everything appeared to be newly decorated and the house was very clean. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely book again if in the area.
So peaceful! Beautiful and stylish home! AMAZING SHOWER!! Could stay here forever! Loved sitting on the back patio at night with the sounds of nature! Will definitely be back+
This home was absolutely immaculate. Nice quiet and relaxing and the owners were more than accommodating. We definitely recommend if you’re going to Paducah Kentucky that this is the place to stay.
This place is truly exceptional. Will stay again
Nice clean, private place. Had a great time feeding the fish at the pond. Close to town if you need anything . Also close to the Land Between the Lakes and KY Dam! Had a great stay.
Great stay highly recommended!

Amazing property with a secluded feel just minutes from town. Great open space, very clean and relaxing. We loved all the little extras that many AIRBNB'S don't supply such as, shower supplies, flashlights, detergent, cleaning supplies. Also several games and puzzles for the family to enjoy. Our family spent a lot of time by the firepit in the back, the yard is well maintained and very few bugs. We look forward to staying again next time we need a place near Paducah.
Very beautiful home. Had a special personalized card waiting for us. Would definitely stay again!
Great, relaxing home, very clean, and had everything you could think of. The hosts were great and extremely helpful.

I could not have picked a better place to stay in Paducah! The home was beautiful and a great location! We came to visit my son who goes to Murray but wanted a place that feel like home rather than a hotel. It was such a memorable weekend with fishing, s’mores, and being able to enjoy home cooked meals together. The hosts were more than accommodating with all the recommendations on things to do and even had snacks perfect for the college kid when we arrived. I most definitely plan to stay again!
Great place to stay

Great house, it was very tidy and lovely place, equipped with everything you may need during your stay. The house will give you privacy you seek for, in somewhat secluded location. However, its really easy to get around the area, and there are restaurants and shops within 10-15 mins drive. Amanda was a great host, the communication was quick and easy.
Nice place, clean
This is a very lovely home.. prime location and hospitality..
Great location and very clean!
Super amazing place! 10/10 would recommend
Very clean and stylish for a new renovation. Appreciated the addition of holiday decor for the Christmas season for holiday travelers.

We had a wonderful stay at this home. We arrived late at night and it was all lit up and sparkling clean. The hosts even had a beautifully decorated Christmas tree and a fruit basket waiting for us. The beds were comfortable and we stayed 8 nights without any issues. We have family in the Paducah area and would love to stay again! It’s a very nice home in a quiet location. I would highly recommend!
beautiful little home, bathrooms are amazing and the kitchen makes me jealous of what I have at home. The host were very responsive when I needed assistance. I will stay here again.
The house was as described. It was in a quiet area, and peaceful.
A wonderful place!

We really enjoyed our second stay. The home is sparkling clean with everything you will need and in a great setting. The host are quick to respond to our needs. You will be pleasantly surprised with your stay. We even had the cutest group of deer move across the lawn. We can’t wait to visit again soon.

The 270home was fantastic in every way thinkable. Nice quiet neighborhood, sparkling clean, spacious with a great master bath and a great kitchen. One extra special thing is feeding the fish in the pond, they really put on a show for us. Amanda and Shawn were so kind they remembered it was our Anniversary getaway and left a special treat for us to enjoy. Those type of things make for a great stay. We have booked a long stay in November. ❤️

The perfect house! Super clean, perfect sprawling layout for our 2 year old and beautiful outdoor space. The hosts are kind, clear communicators and made our stay feel very welcomed and easy. We loved our stay!

We had a fabulous time! Everything spotless and obviously recently renovated as it was like staying in a brand new house. All the finishes were top notch, beds slept great, SO nice to have access to Netflix etc. in the evening. We'd been at the quilt show all day so it was nice to put our feet up and catch the new season of the Great British Baking Show! And duh - there were already SNACKS!! We're already planning to stay here when we return to Paducah next year. I really can't say enough about how great this house is. We didn't fish but I fed them the last day we were there (fish snacks provided too) and MAN there are some mammoth catfish in that pond along with a few turtles. NOTE: it is not handicapped 'accessible' per se (and they DO say that at the site) but my brother who uses a cane really had no issues coming and going - just look at the pictures closely and see if you think it will work for you.
